ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] command list?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nice. Was there a reason the following were omitted or did I just miss it? /cast # /sit (on/off) /pause Also, it would be nice if they were separated into
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:59 AM 11/16/00 -0600, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>At 12:36 PM 11/16/00 -0500, you wrote:
> >I recently found out about the commands such as /book (very nice for my
> >casters), etc. - and the eq manual supplement sucks as far as listing
> >commands.. does anyone know/have a definitive listing of commands?
>
>
>Shameless plug:
>
>The EQ Commands page:
>http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/eqcommands.htm
>
>Enjoy!
>Talies

Nice. Was there a reason the following were omitted or did I just miss it?

/cast #
/sit (on/off)
/pause

Also, it would be nice if they were separated into different sections by
type, but heck, it's a great list anyway!

---Windleaf
